div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1567 Baarin, c. 15 km. SE of Massyaf, N. Phoenicia, 1955 Burial: c. 110 B.C. (Seyrig) Contents: 21 AR Myrina: 1 tetradr. Cyme: 5 tetradr. Smyrna: 2 tetradr. Demetrius I: 9 tetradr. (Antiocheia); 2 dr. (Antiocheia) Antiochus IX: 1 tetradr. (Sidon, yr. 202) Eucratides: 1 tetradr. Disposition: dispersed Seyrig, Tr√©sors du Levant (in press). The tetradr. from Sidon may be a later addition to an already existing hd., formed about 150 B.C.
